Movie: Avatar. Written and directed by James Cameron. Country: USA. Year: 2009. Duration: 162 min. Genre: Action, science fiction, fantastic. Cast: Sam Worthington (Jake Sully), Zoe Saldana (Neytiri), Sigourney Weaver (Dr. Grace Augustine), Michelle Rodriguez (Trudy), Giovanni Ribisi (Selfridge), Joel David Moore (Norm), CCH Pounder (Mo'at), Wes Studi (Eytukan), Laz Alonso (Tsu'Tey), Stephen Lang (Colonel Quaritch), Matt Gerald (Lyle). Production: James Cameron, Jon Landau and Rae Sanchini. Music: James Horner. Photography: Mauro Fiore. Editing: James Cameron, Stephen Rivkin and John Refoua. Production Designer: Rick Carter and Robert Stromberg. Costume: Mayes C. Rubeo and Deborah Lynn Scott. Distributor: Hispanic Foxfilm. USA release: December 18, 2009. Released in Spain: December 18, 2009. Not recommended for children under 7 years.
